attributes.title: You Are Untouched By Incompletion
attributes.description:
Today’s (13th April, 2015) Nithya Satsang on Ishavasya Upanishad in Living Advaita Series. Paramahamsa Nithyananda expands deeper on Pure Consciousness, giving the descriptions about ‘us’ by the Upanishadic Rishis, who are just exploding to speak about the unspeakable Consciousness, and so repeat again and again about Consciousness which is ISNESS, Self-Existent, All-Knowing Seer, Lord of Minds, everything. We as Consciousness are untouched by any incompletion or delusion, says the Upanishad, the ultimate authority – which cannot be negated or questioned by anyone. Never can any work, bring us tiredness or boredom. It is only the incompletions, the past thought patterns, that make us suffer. To experience these Truths and to heal ourselves, He urges us to do Spiritual Explorations or discussions –Vakyartha Sadas. 

Isha Upanishad – Verse 8
sa paryagāc-chukram akāyam avraṇam  asnāviram śuddham apāpa-viddham |
kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ svayambhūr   yathātathyato-arthān vyadadhāc-chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ || 8 ||

In an enriching act to bring and radiate World Peace, Paramahamsa Nithyananda launches a global program called ’10,008 Minutes Of World Peace” starting 14 April 2015, starting with Peace for Kenya and later for other peace deprived places. ""Not only I am going to create Yogis, whose third eyes are awakened, I’m going to put them to use that energy in the direction of creating World peace"", He delcared. The Yogis of Nithyananda Sangha will continuously use their spiritual powers of will to bring the urgently needed World Peace and make it into a reality.
